body:
reported by beholder from forum:

it should be possible to interrupt the card loading process but that doesn't work. Clicking 'Cancel' only gives the impression that downloading has stopped but in the background it continues to download them all.
author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)
title: Cancel card image download continues in background
content:
_From [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/) on July 29, 2011 22:29:47_

reported by beholder from forum:

it should be possible to interrupt the card loading process but that doesn't work. Clicking 'Cancel' only gives the impression that downloading has stopped but in the background it continues to download them all.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=35_
